messages.body: Upcoming Tech Earnings Reports to Watch: $NVDA $TSLA $ATVI https://www.nasdaq.com/article/upcoming-tech-earnings-reports-to-watch-nvda-tsla-atvi-cm915561

links.title: Upcoming Tech Earnings Reports to Watch: NVDA, TSLA, ATVI
links.description: Stocks are down on Friday morning amid a mixed jobs report and varied earnings results from top tech companies like Apple AAPL , Amazon AMZN , and Alphabet GOOGL . Nevertheless, earnings season has been strong across the board, and as Wall Street heads toward the last wave of Q4 reports, many market-moving companies are slated to announce their latest results soon.

messages.body: $TSLA model 3 build quality is "like a Kia in the 90s" short with impunity https://jalopnik.com/tesla-model-3-teardown-by-engineering-firm-reveals-qual-1822678045

links.title: Tesla Model 3 Teardown By Engineering Firm Reveals Quality Flaws Like 'A Kia In The '90s'
links.description: For years, we've heard criticisms about Tesla's fit and finish, but now Sandy Munro-CEO of a Detroit-area consultancy that tears apart and studies automobiles-has seen a new Model 3 up close. His thoughts: "I can't imagine how they released this."
